title: Multidisciplinary Engineering Design Project: Enhancing Practical Skills Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering theories and specialized knowledge by field (electrical/chemical/mechanical/civil)
context.additional_context: A blended learning course where learners from diverse engineering fields collaborate on projects in constrained technology environments (primarily smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners from diverse engineering fields collaborate to propose design solutions considering technical, economic, social, and environmental constraints.
Learners acquire multidisciplinary project management competencies through blended learning (online modules + real-time collaboration).
Through reflective practice, learners document and evaluate decision-making processes in engineering design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
